markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spring Heel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2161)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 108 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Fitted into each of these prosthetic legs is a large spring, tightly bound around a collapsible shaft. When released, the spring unspools rapidly and the shaft telescopes out and back, returning to its compressed form and catapulting you forward.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You Stride up to twice your speed or [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) up to 20 feet horizontally and 5 feet vertically.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spring Heel
